page.name: Application Activity: Reflection
page.content:
Take some time now to consider your current role and what additional information you would need in order to contribute to/participate in an IET program. 

  1. Click here to download the reflection activity handout.
  2. Consider your role, responsibilities, knowledge, expertise, skills and existing network of contacts. 
  3. Use the checkboxes to note what additional knowledge or information you would need in order to contribute to the development of an IET.

After you complete this activity, return to the main course page to review the Unit Summary.
